translated: … The Enumeration of the Root Cause, etc.

original: Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalahetū …pe… kusalanidānā …pe… kusalasambhavā
analyzed: ye keci kusalā dhammā sabbe te kusala hetū pe kusala nidānā pe kusala sambhavā
translated: Whatever are wholesome thoughts, all these are wholesome roots … are wholesome sources … are wholesome origins …

analyzed: pe kusala ppabhavā pe kusala samuṭṭhānā pe kusala āhārā pe kusala ārammaṇā pe
translated: … are wholesome occurrences … are wholesome manifestations … are wholesome productions … are wholesome sources … are wholesome nutriments … are wholesome objects …

analyzed: kusala paccayā pe kusala samudayā pe
translated: are wholesome conditions … are wholesome upsurges …
The root, the cause, the source,
The production, the nutriment, the object,
